ICD — Interface & Data Schemas (Contracts)

Configuration Schemas

Contract: IPC Configuration (ipc_config.yaml) ICD-1
links outgoing: SAD-5.1, NFR-3.3, NFR-3.4, NFR-3.5, NFR-3.6, NFR-3
links incoming: TDD-1.3, TDD-3, TDD-3.6, ISP-1.2
core:

router_bind: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5555” push_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5556” # Added for Core logging router_hwm: 1000 queue_maxsize: 1000 poll_timeout_ms: 100 response_timeout_s: 5.0 extensions:

path: “./extensions” # Root for tools/routines discovery

logserver:

pull_bind: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5556” poll_timeout_ms: 1 # Tight loop for high throughput log_rotation_mb: 50 log_retention_days: 30

services:
ui:

dealer_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5555” push_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5556” queue_maxsize: 100 poll_timeout_ms: 100

runtime:

dealer_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5555” push_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5556” queue_maxsize: 50 poll_timeout_ms: 100

audio:

dealer_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5555” push_connect: “tcp://127.0.0.1:5556” queue_maxsize: 50 poll_timeout_ms: 10

Message Protocols
Contract: Frame Structure ICD-2
links outgoing: SAD-3.2, SAD-3.6, SAD-1.4, SAD-1
links incoming: ICD-2.1, ICD-2.2, ICD-2.3, ICD-2.4, ICD-2.5, ICD-2.6, ICD-2.7, ICD-2.8, ICD-2.9, TDD-2.4, TDD-3.5
Contract: **Core ↔ Services (ROUTER-DEALER):** ICD-2.1
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: **Outbound (DEALER):** `[metadata_json, payload_bytes...]` ICD-2.2
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: **Inbound (ROUTER):** `[service_identity, b'', metadata_json, payload_bytes...]` ICD-2.3
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: **All → LogServer (PUSH-PULL):** ICD-2.4
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: **Frame:** `[metadata_json, message_string]` ICD-2.5
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: **Payloads:** ICD-2.6
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: Text: JSON-encoded UTF-8 bytes. ICD-2.7
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: Binary: Raw bytes (PCM, tensors). ICD-2.8
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: Multi-part: Supported for zero-copy efficiency. ICD-2.9
links outgoing: ICD-2
Contract: Metadata Schema (JSON) ICD-3
links outgoing: FSD-6.3, SAD-4.7, SAD-4
links incoming: ICD-4

Every IPC message frame 0 (Metadata) must validate against:
{

“source”: “UI | Audio | Runtime | Core”, “destination”: “Target_Service_Name”, “command”: “function_name_or_signal”, “request_id”: “uuid-v4-string”, “timestamp”: “ISO-8601-string”, “priority”: 1, “payload_type”: “json | binary | text”

} // Note: Priority 0 = High, 1 = Normal
Contract: Response Payload Schema ICD-4
links outgoing: ICD-3
{

“source”: “Runtime”, “destination”: “UI”, “command”: “llm_inference_response”, “request_id”: “uuid-echoed”, “timestamp”: “ISO-8601-string”, “status”: “success | error”, “error_code”: “optional_string_or_null”

}
